'''Preview 26.0.26''' is the third ''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 26.0]], released on December 17, 2025, for Windows, Xbox, and servers, which addresses backend issues.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/41819389887373-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-26-0-25|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 26.0.25/26|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=December 10, 2025}}</ref> This is the final ''Preview'' released in 2025.
